body:
HipChat module

This is the HipChat Tangler module
hipchat
Tangler\Module\HipChat\Module

Trigger: New HipChat Message trigger

This monitors a room for new messages
new_message
Tangler\Module\HipChat\NewMessageTrigger
TODO
  • roomid (string): Room ID to monitor
  • apitoken (string): API Token

Action: Send HipChat Message

This action sends a new message to a HipChat room
send_message
Tangler\Module\HipChat\SendMessageAction
  • apitoken (string): API Token
  • roomid (string): Room ID
  • message (string): Actual message
  • fromname (string): From name
